name: Fruit Wars
description:
In Fruit Wars the player assembles a powerful team of fruits to regain control over the department store which got taken over by the vegetable kingdom.

The player clashes with enemy teams which get continuously more difficult throughout the stages. Consequently, the player must make multiple decisions in team- and strategy planning in order to sweep through all seven stages and free the department store from the vegetable kingdom's reign. Given the setting and art style, the player can expect a fresh and enjoyable alternative to usual strategy games.

There are a lot of different ways to create your team, choose your units wisely because the destiny of the whole department store is on the line.

It is created by a small student team from Germany.

We strived to create a fun auto battler, enjoayable for all ages.
